fileheader.author: Richard Harrison
fileheader.copyright: Copyright (C) 2017 Richard Harrison, All rights reserved
fileheader.description: Dassault Mirage 2000-5 Aerodynamic data built from vspaero; CG (8.56, 0, 1.422)M, 2019-09-07 16:21
fileheader.note: Built using VSPAERO. VSPAero control sub surfaces are used for the elevons, slats and rudder. These are all then processed and this data is built from the results (together with the -stab to get the derivatives)
Aircraft origin for measurements is the nose
VSPAERO notes: Rudder deflection is LE right. Elevator is TE down.
Built with AeroTool 1.0.0.0: Options: AeroDetail=Medium, Gear, Flaps, WingAsymmetry, HTailAsymmetry, VTailDamage, WakeIterations=1

reference.author: Richard Harrison, rjh@zaretto.com
reference.title: Mirage 2000-5 Aerodynamic data built from vspaero; AeroRP (8.56, 0, 1.422)M

pure_gain.name: cg-x-chord-percent
pure_gain.description: Percent offset of the CoP from the CG
